docs.text: the rich legacy of cinema has left us with certain indelible images .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the tinkling christmas tree bell in " it's a wonderful life . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: bogie's speech at the airport in " casablanca . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: little elliott's flying bicycle , silhouetted by the moon in " e . t . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and now , " starship troopers " director paul verhoeven adds one more image that will live in our memories forever : doogie houser doing a vulcan mind meld with a giant slug .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " starship troopers , " loosely based on the robert heinlein novel , is the story of an interstellar war between humans and giant insects .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in the hands of verhoeven , the mammoth sci-fi battle flick is one of the most astonishingly bad films ever made , a monument to inept filmmaking on a colossal scale .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to put it simply , it's a bug bomb .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in " robocop " and " total recall , " verhoeven displayed a gift for creating an entertaining mix of violence , special effects and social satire , and " starship troopers " starts off in similar fashion , with a tongue-in-cheek futuristic military recruitment ad that shows promise .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: things go downhill fast , though , as we meet our heroes , a group of buenos aires teens preparing to graduate from high school .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: inexplicably , johnny rico , carmen ibenez , dizzy flores and xander barcalow are played by square-jawed anglo kids who look like they just stepped out of a mountain dew commercial .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's a veritable " alpha centuri 90210 " as we watch the love-smitten teens squabble in the name of love .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: michael ironside plays their teacher , who waves around a cheesy fake severed arm while lecturing about civic responsibilities .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: eventually , the kids join the military , with dreams of glory in their addled little minds .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one of their classmates , carl jenkins ( " doogie houser's " neil patrick harris , ) snags a job in military intelligence because of his strong psychic abilities .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he displays his gift by psychically ordering a pet ferret to crawl up his mother's leg .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a long , dull boot camp sequence follows , enlivened only by an extended coed shower scene where the recruits swap snappy banter as the " showgirls " director's camera roams over their buff bodies .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: finally , a full hour into the film , the war finally starts and we meet the enemy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the bugs hail from klendathu and colonize planets by hurling their spores into space .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they attack starships by spinning around and firing deadly plasma blasts from their rears .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: yes , incredible as it seems , the bugs actually kill with cosmic farts .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a phenomenally large amount of money was spent creating the computer animated insects and the results are mixed at best .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sweeping distant shots depicting hordes of giant bugs racing to attack are both impressive and scary , but the close-ups are a different matter .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the insects have an odd , artificial look , like origami creations with a mottled plastic coating .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the attack scenes are intensely violent , as one would expect from verhoeven , but the overall look is too phony to generate any real tension .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while the action is frantic , the military strategy , wildly illogical even by hollywood standards , grows tiresome quickly .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: verhoeven tries to spice things up by throwing in more satiric news coverage , but the faux-jingoistic scenes of children " doing their part for the war effort " by squishing roaches on a sidewalk aren't enough to make up for the long stretches of sheer dreck .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one can only guess what paul verhoeven was trying to do here .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his customary one part satire , two parts ultra-violence formula is way out of whack , and most of the film just flounders .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in " showgirls " fashion , some scenes are almost bad enough to be good .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: an intergalactic kegger party , with jake busey playing " dixie " on a green plexiglas fiddle , has a certain bizarre appeal .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a sex scene between two of the teens achieves a smarmy charm , enhanced a few minutes later when the female receives a fatal jab from a bug , but tells her hero that she doesn't mind dying .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " it's okay , " she gasps , " i got to have you ! "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and then , of course , there's doogie's mind meld with a bug .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's possible that verhoeven was attempting to create an homage to the era of the original novel .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: heinlein's pre- " stranger in a strange land " books were aimed at adolescent males , and " starship troopers " has the antiseptic retro-future look of late 50s/early 60s sci-fi .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the one cityscape shown is a jetsons-like gleaming metropolis , with flying cars whizzing past an obvious matte painting .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the hairstyles are retro too , straight from the frankie avalon , annette funicello school of fashion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ultimately , verhoeven's motives are irrelevant .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he has produce a gargantuan film that fails as an action film or as a social satire .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it even fails to be an entertaining bad movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: avoid " starship troopers " at all costs .
docs.label: negative
